meanings.definition: An indefinitely long period of time.
meanings.sent1: It felt like an aeon waiting for the bus to arrive.
meanings.sent2: The stars have been shining for aeons.
meanings.sent3: After an aeon of searching, she finally found her missing sock.
meanings.sent4: The ancient ruins stood silent, bearing witness to the aeons that had passed.
meanings.sent5: The slow drip of the faucet echoed through the empty house, marking the aeon of loneliness.

meanings.definition: A period of time characterized by a particular feature or quality.
meanings.sent1: The medieval aeon was marked by knights and castles.
meanings.sent2: The digital aeon has revolutionized communication.
meanings.sent3: In the aeon of neon fashion, bright colors ruled the runway.
meanings.sent4: The golden aeon of prosperity came to an end with the stock market crash.
meanings.sent5: The aeon of peace was shattered by the sound of war drums.
